subject.normal: Dual Boot - U R G E N T

headers.subject: Re: Dual Boot - U R G E N T
headers.received: (from mail@localhost) by mail.redhat.com (8.11.6/8.8.7) id g028ClO29512 for redhat-install-list@listman.redhat.com; Wed, 2 Jan 2002 03:12:47 -0500

headers.list-id: Getting started with Red Hat Linux <redhat-install-list.redhat.com>

body.para: I am using FAT32 for Win98 (4GB), NTFS for Win2K Adv Server (8G), after that I installed RedHat 7.2 in about 6G.

quote.quotepara: We need more info .. like no. of partitions, partition type with os, .and partition size, harddisk size ... Then only we can give u lilo configuration or grub configuration ....
Finally whether u want to use lilo or grub ....
To: redhat-install-list@redhat.com Subject: Re: Dual Boot - U R G E N T References: <Pine.LNX.4.04.10009140053210.13056-100000@snoopy.peanuts>

<mailto:redhat-install-list-request@redhat.com?subject=subscribe>>List-Id: Getting started with Red Hat Linux <redhat-install-list.redhat.com>>List-Unsubscribe: <https://listman.redhat.com/mailman/listinfo/redhat-install-list>,
<mailto:redhat-install-list-request@redhat.com?subject=unsubscribe>>List-Archive:
I have a computer with Win98 and Win2K in a single HDD. I also
installed>> RedHat 7.2 on it. I tried my best to boot from LILO or GRUB with
multiple>> booting choice, none worked, it boots from Win. But still I can boot using>> Linux boot diskette for Linux. I want all the booting OS come in the
Looking forward to hearing from you.

quote.quotefooter: -- Dennis K. Grow RedHat 7.2 Kernel: 2.4.13 KDE: 2.2-10 ALSA: 0.5.11 9:00pm up 9:19, 6 users, load average: 0.21, 0.13, 0.11
